snippet.title: MOTHER Trailer Final - Psychological Horror Game
snippet.description:
Play now: 
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1381980/MOTHER
ITCH - https://irwinsegarane.itch.io/mothergame

MOTHER is a short first-person psychological horror game about protecting your children while descending deeper & deeper into madness. 
Defend them at all costs. Be careful, because their death is permanent!

_________________________________________________________________________________________________

This is a passion project of mine that I've developed in my personal time while I was studying.

Art by
Thibaut Reimel - https://www.artstation.com/dc-thibaut-r
Adrien Di Giovanni - https://www.artstation.com/adriendigiovanni
